mainText:
I just saw the news on the internet this morning and still cannot believe that he is gone now.
 
I have been using ipod, iphone and mac laptop for several years now and really love them.
When I had difficult times studying aboard the music made me cheer up and that was because of the ipod...
 
Always admired his job..
Hope he'd be in a peace and I will always remember him...
author: Ji
